miscellaneous checks creating new Create Miscellaneous Check
section.para: For payments related to non-Inventory goods or services, you have the ability to create miscellaneous A/P Checks. To create a miscellaneous Check, select the "Create Miscellaneous Check" option. The following screen will appear:
When creating a miscellaneous A/P Check, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Vendor number of the Vendor you want to create a miscellaneous Check for.
Specify the amount of the miscellaneous Check.
Specify the date to appear on the miscellaneous Check.
Specify the Bank Account you want to use for the miscellaneous Check.
Select one of the following Expense distribution options:
Expense Category: Specify the Expense Category you want to distribute the payment to.

Create Credit Memo: Once the miscellaneous Check is posted, a Credit Memo in the Check amount will be created. This Credit Memo will offset your Accounts Payable for the specified Vendor. You would use this option, for example, to handle prepayments made to Vendors.
Enter a Memo line to be included on the bottom portion of the printed miscellaneous Check.
This is a scrolling text field with word-wrapping for entering Notes related to the miscellaneous Check.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a miscellaneous Check, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the miscellaneous Check, using the specified parameters.
